other_tests.findings: Did not reveal signs of a mitochondrial disorder.
Hypergonadotropic hypogonadism, partial growth hormone deficiency.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Partial growth hormone deficiency remained significant despite normalization of gonadotropin levels.

other_tests.findings: GH peak response less than 3 ng/mL indicates growth hormone deficiency.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Insulin tolerance test was prematurely stopped due to severe symptomatic hypoglycemia.

other_tests.findings: Severe and nonspecific dilated cardiomyopathy with depressed left ventricular fractional shortening.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Depressed left ventricular fractional shortening persisted despite various treatments.
